description.value:
You channel the inner dragon at the peak of your zealous spirit and let loose a spiritual breath or carve a slash of divine power with your weapon. @UUID[Compendium.immortal-ardor.macros.Macro.xumjguwPtOtkC7tL]{Spend your Zeal}, and creatures in a @Template[cone|distance:30] from you need to make a @Check[reflex|against:dervish|basic] against your class DC. The effect of this Zenith is dependent on the amount of Zeal spent:

  • 1-2 Zeal: @Damage[max(2,(2+1*floor((@actor.level - 1)/2)))d6[spirit]|options:area-damage] damage, but targets treat their save as one degree of success better.

  • 3-4 Zeal: As above, and persistent spirit damage equal to half the above number of d6 dice rounded down on a critical failure. @Damage[floor(max(2,(2+1*floor((@actor.level - 1)/2)))/2)d6[{spirit,persistent]]

  • 5 Zeal: As 3-4 Zeal, but targets suffer persistent damage on a failure.

Special: If you are aligned to a particular type of dragon, such as through a draconic exemplar or bloodline, you can choose to deal damage matching their listed breath damage type instead of spirit damage.

Level (+2) The damage increases by 1d6.
